about.title: About
about.description: :bot was built with :heart: by :user for the DeFi Kingdoms Discord community. Please feel free to send me feature requests, bug reports, or other questions and suggestions!
about.coffee_description: Enjoy :bot? Consider buying me a coffee

help.title: Help
help.description: Use the links below to navigate to the documentation pages, or select a command from the input below to get it's description
help.getting_started_description: :bot uses Discord's built-in slash commands. Type `/` and it will show you a list of it's commands, along with the various options to use them. All sensitive information is sent privately and can only be seen by you. Click the button below for more information on getting started.
help.bug_report_description: To report a bug, please use the `/about` command

create.title: Create your tipping account
create.description: Please create your account using MetaMask by clicking the link below.

description.already_banned: :member has already been banned from tipping
description.member_banned: :member has been banned from sending and receiving tips

description.not_banned: :member has not been banned from tipping
description.member_unbanned: :member can now send and receive tips

gift.title: @:user sent a gift of :amount :symbol
gift.description: Be the first to click the button below and claim this gift!
gift.pending_description: You have a pending gift, please wait for it to be claimed before sending a new gift
gift.blacklisted: You can't claim because you have been blacklisted
gift.no_wallet: You can't claim because you have no wallet
gift.banned: You have been banned from sending and receiving tips
gift.self: You cannot claim your own gifts

rain.missed_description: @:user rained in :channel. Unfortunately you missed the rain because you have not set up your tipping wallet yet. If you want to catch the next rain, please use the `/deposit` to create a new wallet
rain.no_users_description: I couldn't find any users to rain on. Please try again when the chat is a bit more active
rain.wake_up: Wake up people! @:user is trying to rain, but nobody is here!

tip.tip_me: I am flattered but I cannot take this from you
tip.tip_bot: You are not allowed to tip bots

description.bug_report: To report a bug, please use the `/about` command
description.amount_incorrect: The amount is wrongly formatted or missing
description.insufficient_funds: Your current balance doesn't allow you to make this transaction.
description.amount_exceeds_balance: The amount exceeds your balance + safety margin (0.001 :symbol). Use the `/deposit` command to get your wallet address to send some more :symbol. Or try again with a lower amount
description.amount_exceeds_gas_balance: Your gas balance is too low to make this transaction
description.create_new_wallet: You have no tipping wallet yet. Please use the `/deposit` command to create a new wallet.
description.wait_for_queue: Please wait for your current queue to be processed
description.tipped_without_wallet: @:user tipped you some :symbol! You don't have a wallet yet, so I have created one for you! Use the `/help` command to find out how to make use of my services.
description.inactive: You have not activated your account yet
description.unverified: Your account has not been verified yet
description.banned: Your account has been banned from sending and receiving tips. Please contact an admin if you think was done by mistake. Or visit :accountDashboard to withdraw your tokens
description.no_account: You have not yet registered your account. Please use the `/create-command` to register

unable_to_tip.unverified: :username has not yet verified his/her account
unable_to_tip.no_account: :username has not yet registered an account

small_tip: I’ll see what I can do.
large_tip: You will be a name to remember, :title.
Gaia will not forget this, I am sure.
Look at the muscles on you!
burn: Wow, my pockets are always accepting donations.
stats: The riches of some people, incredible.
I bet you they all live in the capital.
Do not compare yourself to others.
An excellent start to the Age of Heroes.
price: This explains the man that came in earlier...
Oh my! Are the Bank's reserves running dry?
